```{r}
library(modelr)
?modelr::heights
x <- modelr::heights
attach(x)
heights$heightInt <- cut(heights$height, breaks = 8)
knitr::kable(summary(heights[,1:4]))
knitr::kable(summary(heights[,5:9]))

```
# Plot 
```{r}
install.packages("ggplot2")
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(heights, mapping =aes(x = height, y = income))+geom_point()

```
